original_text: But the Lord said to Samuel, “Do not look on his appearance or on the height of his stature, because I have rejected him. For the Lord sees not as man sees: man looks on the outward appearance, but the Lord looks on the heart.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 사무엘에게 이르시되 그의 용모와 키를 보지 말라 내가 이미 그를 버렸노라 내가 보는 것은 사람과 같지 아니하니 사람은 외모를 보거니와 나 여호와는 중심을 보느니라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: But the Lord said to Samuel,
Do not look on his appearance
or on the height of his stature,
For the Lord sees not as man sees:
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주께서 사람이 보는 것처럼 보지 아니하심이라

sentences.original_text: man looks on the outward appearance,
but the Lord looks on the heart.”
